translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Triad

original: 15.3. Hetuduka, Vipākattika🔽Hetuṁ vipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Hetuṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetu duka vipāka ttika  hetum vipākam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na vipākaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  hetum vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na hetu na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The Section on the Triad with Root-Cause🔽With a root-cause and a result-of-past-action as condition, there arises what is not a root-cause and is not a result-of-past-action. (Three triplets.) … With a root-cause and a result-of-past-action-cum-root-cause as condition, there arises what is not a root-cause and is not a result-of-past-action. (Three triplets.) …

original: Nahetuṁ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With what is not a root-cause and is not a result-of-past-action-cum-root-cause as condition, there arises what is not a root-cause and is not a result-of-past-action. (Three triplets.) …
